spec_data.Name: perl-Perl-Critic-Deprecated
spec_data.Description:
The included policies are:
  - Write "$my_variable = 42" instead of "$MyVariable = 42".
  - Write "sub my_function{}" instead of "sub MyFunction{}".
  - Put source-control keywords in every file.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 03:03:32 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl::Critic policies which have been superseded by others
